alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 9:46PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Castle Rock, and Byers. * WHEN...From 2 AM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet
